Emotional.name: Emotional
Emotional.description: Music is a powerful emotional experience for you. You like listening to music that make you feel connected to the music itself, probably likes singing along them with feels too!

Enchanted.name: Enchanted
Enchanted.description: Music lets you express yourself like no other, whether it be the feeling of sadness, heartbrokeness, solemnity, or anything but you just find yourself trascending while listening to music.

Energetic.name: Energetic
Energetic.description: Music lifts you and sets you on the groove, setting up your mood or getting on your day gets easier with music. Might be a fun person to be with, energetic and a good one.

Jolly Casual.name: Jolly Casual
Jolly Casual.description: You are the casual listener who is listening to feel-good music. Probably using music for general use such as doing chores, going through the day, commuting, or whatever. Pretty casual about it.
